${ModID}:AncientBlade.NAME: Ancient Blade
${ModID}:AncientBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you Channeled an Orb this turn, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:ExploreRuins.NAME: Explore Ruins
${ModID}:ExploreRuins.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 ${ModID}:Glyph. NL Draw 1 card. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!.

${ModID}:AncientTexts.NAME: Ancient Texts
${ModID}:AncientTexts.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Enter ${ModID}:Ancient. NL If you exited another Stance, draw !M! more cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:AncientTexts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Enter ${ModID}:Ancient. NL If you exited another Stance, draw !M! more cards.

${ModID}:EyeOfRa.NAME: Eye of Ra
${ModID}:EyeOfRa.DESCRIPTION: Enter ${ModID}:Runic. NL Gain !M! Focus. NL Lose 1 Focus the next !M! times you play an Attack.

${ModID}:Chakram.NAME: Chakram
${ModID}:Chakram.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:Secrets.NAME: Discover Secrets
${ModID}:Secrets.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots. NL Fill your Orb slots with ${ModID}:Glyphs.

${ModID}:DaringEscape.NAME: Daring Escape
${ModID}:DaringEscape.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Channel 2 ${ModID}:Glyphs. NL Exit your Stance.

${ModID}:RunicSpear.NAME: Runic Spear
${ModID}:RunicSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Affected by Focus !M! times and Lock-On.

${ModID}:AncientObelisk.NAME: Ancient Obelisk
${ModID}:AncientObelisk.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, Channel !M! random Orb. NL Enter ${ModID}:Runic.
${ModID}:AncientObelisk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, Channel !M! random Orbs. NL Enter ${ModID}:Runic.
